game.name: The Complex Chapter 1: Who, What, Where?
game.shortDescription: Wake up in a trashed apartment and investigate mysterious disappearances. Solve challenging puzzles, interact with others, and confront a terrifying boss. Your choices lead to one of five unique endings in this tense, atmospheric puzzle-horror game
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wake up in a trashed apartment and investigate mysterious disappearances. Solve challenging puzzles, interact with others, and confront a terrifying boss. Your choices lead to one of five unique endings in this tense, atmospheric puzzle-horror game
